title: Divyam Diamond Chandrani Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold (సువర్ణo) with meticulous attention to detail. Adorned with dazzling
high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features Ruby (రత్నం) and Emerald (పచ్చ) accents for a touch of traditional elegance. Finished with a subtle Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Chandrani Haaram boasts a unique, modern interpretation of a classic design. The intricate chevron pattern on the necklace creates a captivating geometric effect. Features a gracefully designed pendant embellished with Ruby and Emerald stones, evoking the charm of temple jewelry (దేవాలయ ఆభరణాలు). Dainty gold beads cascade from the edges, adding a touch of movement and grace.
colors: Predominantly gold with brilliant white CZ stones. Accents of rich red from the Rubies and vibrant green from the Emeralds create a harmonious and eye-catching color palette.
occasions: and other special occasions. An ideal choice for a bride (వధువు) during her muhurtham (ముహూర్తం) or for a sophisticated look at any formal event. Also suitable for traditional Telugu functions such as Seemantham or half-saree function.
description: This Chandrani Haaram offers a perfect blend of tradition and modern aesthetics. Its brilliant sparkle and intricate design are sure to make a statement. The use of high-quality materials ensures lasting beauty and durability. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. Its contemporary design allows it to be paired with both traditional and modern attire.
